PHRASE.LANG: He prefers cold weather, so make sure to lower your room's thermostat. [#Legal]
Il vient du froid, alors baissez la température de votre appartement. [#Legal]
Er zieht kaltes Wetter vor, die Raumtemperatur sollte also gesenkt werden. [#Legal]
Predilige i climi freddi, quindi ricordati di abbassare il riscaldamento. [#Legal]
¡Le gusta el frío, así que baja el termostato de tu casa! [#Legal]
추운 날씨를 선호하는 동물이기 때문에 실내 온도를 좀 낮춰 주세요. [#Legal]
He prefers cold weather, so make sure to lower your room's thermostat. [#Legal]
牠比較喜歡寒冷的天氣，所以緊記降低房間的恆溫器。 [#Legal]
